column6:
Historic cottage remodeled to a modern gem. Original Mediterranean floors and new sleek lines pave the way to a wrap-around covered outdoor deck.
Walk to restaurants, shopping, and entertainment.
City of Port Aransas Reg.#524862

NO trailers, boats, or jet ski are allowed due to H.O.A. regulations.

Dogs up to 25 lbs., and child friendly, sleeps up to 3 or 4 if using the full size convertible couch.
